geometry.title: Bevier-Curve
geometry.descr: DRAG and DROP the dots to change the curve

geometry.title: Circle
geometry.descr: Use ARROWS (⇧ ⇩) to change the number of slices

geometry.title: Polygon-Contains
geometry.descr: Move the MOUSE over the map

geometry.title: Polygon-Rounded
geometry.descr: CLICK to create a new polygon

geometry.title: Polygon-Straight-Skeleton
geometry.descr: CLICK to create a new polygon

geometry.title: Raycast-Linear
geometry.descr: Use ARROWS (⇧ ⇩⇦ ⇨) or WASD to move the rect and MOUSE to aim

fractal.title: Lightning-Bolt
fractal.descr: CLICK to create a lightning bolt

pathfinding.title: Breadth-First-Search
pathfinding.descr: CLICK on the tiles to create or remove a wall

pathfinding.title: Greedy-Best-First-Search
pathfinding.descr: CLICK on the tiles to create or remove a wall

others.title: Circular-Runner-Double-Jump
others.descr: CLICK to jump (double) and use ARROWS (⇦ ⇨) to change the circle radius

others.title: Dashed-Lines
others.descr: Use ARROWS to change dash (⇦ ⇨) and gap (⇧ ⇩) size

others.title: Moving-Around
others.descr: Use ARROWS (⇧ ⇩⇦ ⇨) or WASD to move

others.title: Scale-Mode
others.descr: CLICK to switch the scale mode

others.title: Visibility
others.descr: DRAG and DROP the shapes to see the light effect and press L to show the lines
